# DEPARTMENT OF STATE TELEGRAM
**UNCLASSIFIED**

::: {.cable-meta}
:::


1. The Bolivian ICEM Representative, Nielsen Reyes, has given us copies of letter 12 March to him from John Thomas, Director, ICEM, proposing that Bolivian Foreign Minister be briefed on organization's activities in Bolivia. Also suggested Embassy and USAID be briefed. Purpose is to have ICEM's work considered in OAS discussion of transfer of technology.
2. Local Rep has given us copies of memo on ICEM activities in Bolivia which he gave to Foreign Minister and one which he gave to Finance Minister. We are pouching these memos to USOAS.

***
